faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Still have questions? Contact our team via

items.question: How much funding can I receive?
items.answer: The amount you may be awarded depends on your individual situation and the scope of your project. Most foundations typically provide funding ranging from 1000 SEK up to 100,000 SEK per year.

items.question: Is it possible to receive funding from more than one foundation?
items.answer: Yes, you can receive support from multiple foundations at once. However, if you are granted more funds than needed for your intended purpose, you are expected to either allocate the surplus to the same goal or return the excess. Keep in mind that grants are considered gifts and should be used responsibly.

items.question: Do you want to promote a scholarship?
items.answer: You’re welcome to showcase your foundation or scholarship on our platform. Listing your funding opportunity is completely free. Don’t hesitate to reach out.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: We’re Alexander Winqvist and Alexander Svensson, two friends who met during our master’s studies at Stockholm University. While studying, we were amazed by the number of Swedish scholarships available, but equally frustrated by how difficult it was to find them and to figure out what they actually funded. That challenge sparked our mission: to make Sweden’s grant and foundation ecosystem accessible to everyone. Our platform uses a blend of AI and structured data to match your unique profile with the most relevant funding opportunities. After a quick form and a one-time payment, you’ll receive a custom PDF report with recommendations sent straight to your inbox. No subscription, no recurring fees, just transparent, one-click access to your next potential funding source. We’ve built this for students, entrepreneurs, researchers, and changemakers who don’t have time to sift through hundreds and hundreds of foundation websites. We as founders and our system continuously learn and improve to deliver even smarter results over time. We believe in unlocking opportunities, not hiding them behind bureaucracy. Welcome to the smarter and easy way to find Swedish funding.

legal.privacyPolicyTitle: Privacy Policy – How we handle your personal data
privacyPolicyContent: We at StiPo W&S AB, a Swedish company based in Täby, care about your privacy and comply with the applicable data protection legislation, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and complementary Swedish laws. This policy explains how we collect, process, and protect your personal data.
We collect personal data when you:
– Fill in forms or surveys on our website
– Purchase our services or participate in our activities
The information we may collect includes:
– Other information you provide in free-text fields
We collect only the information necessary to:
– Follow up statistics and improve our offerings
Your personal data is processed securely and only by authorized personnel. We use technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or manipulation.
Data is stored within the EU/EEA and is not shared with third parties without your explicit consent unless required by law.
We store your data only as long as needed for the intended purposes or as required by law (e.g., accounting laws).
rightsList: File complaints to the Swedish Authority for Privacy Protection (IMY)

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer for External Links
content: As part of our service, we provide email content that includes information about various foundations and links to external websites.
We do not take responsibility for:
– The accuracy, updates, or completeness of that information
– Any direct or indirect damages from visiting or acting on external information

sections.heading: 1. Ownership and Copyright
sections.text: All content on this website is exclusively owned or licensed by Stipo W&S AB and protected by Swedish and international copyright law. Downloading or using content is allowed for private use only. Redistribution without written permission is prohibited.

sections.heading: 2. Accuracy and Responsibility
sections.text: We strive for accurate and relevant information but cannot guarantee completeness or error-free content. Stipo W&S AB assumes no responsibility for losses caused by using or not accessing the site.

sections.heading: 3. External Links
sections.text: We may include links to external websites. These are provided for convenience and do not imply endorsement. We are not responsible for damages caused by these links.

sections.heading: 4. Trademarks and Rights
sections.text: Logos, trademarks, and product names belong to their respective owners and cannot be used without permission.

sections.heading: 5. Personal Data
sections.text: We collect and handle personal data according to our Privacy Policy and applicable law.

sections.heading: 6. Third-Party Cooperation
sections.text: We may collaborate with external providers bound by confidentiality agreements. Note: infrastructure providers like hosting and internet providers may not be under such agreements.
